summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MyProBuddy AI Grant Matching Platform. Backend APIs are mostly functional with minor issues. Frontend UI components and navigation work well. AI grant matching system operational with fallback mechanism.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Minor - error code inconsistency but functionality works

resolved_issues.issue: API expected separate page1/page2 objects but frontend sent combined data
resolved_issues.resolution: Fixed by creating GrantScreeningCombined model and updating endpoint

resolved_issues.issue: Coupon validation failed due to boolean vs string comparison
JSON serialization error with pandas NaN values
resolved_issues.resolution: Added fillna() to clean data before serialization

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown selection in screening form has interaction issues
ui_bugs.details: Dropdown options not properly visible/clickable during automated testing

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fixes needed: 1) Fix dropdown interaction in screening form for better UX, 2) Standardize HTTP error codes (401 vs 403), 3) Consider adding more robust error handling for form submissions

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (UI components and navigation fully functional, minor dropdown interaction issue)
